website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for active kids and for parents who want a model they can put together without much fuss; though it's pricey, it's worth it for all it has to offer.
pros: Parents are enthusiastic about this model's child-friendly features that include rounded edges, durable build, and spacious design
can be used inside or outside
cons: Rare issues with the door sticking or not closing easily have been reported
On the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and feels sturdy with suction cups and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few days ago and installed it around the large Baby Care Play Mat. It was easy to install and feels sturdy with suction cups and the yellow inserts that sit on top. But I actually reduced it down by two pieces and it is still sturdy - at least for now since baby is rolling and not crawling or pulling on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this kid corral is a little crazy expensive (got the sky blue) but so far I’m really impressed. Our kiddo is just starting to crawl and is into everything! It was really one of the few that can actually be made into a rectangle shape and still be stable and sturdy. We have ours on wood floors so I don’t know if this is the same for carpet but on our floors, the sides do not wobble. The bottom of each panel has this little plastic disc to help make it “stick”. It’s really easy to put together too. Did lots of research...so glad we got this one. Worth the high cost!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cutouts
customer_reviews.text: arms get stuck in the holes and legs get stuck in the slots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Item seems good but the corner caps were not completely pinched out. They should easily slide on the corner but mine has a plastic piece (in every corner clip) that was supposed to be removed. Due to that piece I can't slip it on so I have to figure a way to break that piece. For the price , it's kind of ridiculous I have to do this
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great quality and great customer service. They emailed me and made sure I got my play pen. I originally bought their baby care large play mat (love it too btw) and bought a cheaper play pen to go with it. However, the play pen I got was poor quality and didn't hold up well. So I returned it and ordered the Baby Care play pen. It fits the play mat perfectly and also very sturdy. It's twice as expensive as the other one, but I believe it's worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Nandin

customer_reviews.title: Solid/sturdy but limited in some ways
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I just wish you could order extra panels without ordering a whole new set :(. I wished I could get two more a plain one and a door. Also, the yellow "braces" are only straight or 90degree angles, so you can only do one rectangular or square configuration. Seems there could be a better way to make it fit a non-square type of space
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gate
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gate for our family room. Super durable and thick plastic. One Star off bc after 3 months, the suction cups no longer stick to the hardwood making it easy for baby to push the slates away. She can only push them a few inches, and they won’t disconnect. But she loves putting everything into her mouth so all the crumbs that seep under the fence is exposed. If your baby is learning to stand, be careful of the lack of suction as a little jerk could make little one stumble or bump chin on the fence. Other than that, easy to clean and an overall great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible colors, but does the job...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was a good product, but I ended up returning it because I couldn't get over the colors and the bottom kind of slips.. They really need to find some neutral colors. I'm not sure if they could ever not have the fence move completely...but I found it a little discomforting when my LO would stand there and she could push the gate into a different shape. Maybe she is just strong? Or maybe you need to put some water under the suction? IDK.. overall I think I would have kept it if not for the clashing colors.
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR ALL BABIES AND PERFECT FOR TODDLERS TOO
customer_reviews.text: THIRD ONE I HAVE PURCHASED FOR GRANDKIDS. ITS THE BEST PIECE OF MIND FOR PARENTS EVER. THE KIDS CAN LEARN TO SCOOT AND ROLL IN A VERY SAFE AREA. THE MAT THAT CAN BE PURCHASED SEPARATELY IS DURABLE, EASY TO WIPE, AND GOOD RUBBER CUSHION. LIKE THAT BABY'S BARE BODY HAS GOOD GRIP TO REALLY WORK TO LEARN TO MOVE AROUND AND NOT SLIP. ALL OF THE KIDS MUSCLES DEVELOPED GOOD AND THEY LEARNED QUICKLY TO PULL UP TO STANDING AND THEN HOLD THE TOP OF PERIMETER AND WALK AROUND WITHOUT ASSISTANCE. SO SAFE YOU CAN LEAVE THEM TO COOK, SHOWER, AND MORE AS LONG AS THEY ARE CONTENT.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great gate but doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This was the only baby gate that had the dimensions that we wanted. I love how the baby can see us through the slits- we tried another gate at first but our baby hated how he couldn't see us that well. The door design is great, easy to open with just one hand. My only gripe is the suction cups do not work at all. Not sure if we got a faulty bunch, but every little touch, my 8 month old can push the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great safe area for toddler to play
customer_reviews.text: As a work at home mom, i needed my 1 year old contained in one area while I work a little bit at a time. This play area is safe and provides enough area that she can walk around and play with toys. My husband and I can sit in there with her at the same time, I like how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this baby cage
customer_reviews.text: We looked into a lot of different “cages” to contain our rambunctious 8 month old. This play pen has long slots that he cannot climb, but he is able to hold it and walk along it. We chose the white and blue one so it’s easy on the eyes. We did not do the traditional rectangle in our living room. We finagled it so he has more room but cannot push it out. We have used it in its tradiotional shape out on our patio and it worked great. It’s not the easiest to transfer from place to place but on occasion it’s fine. So far we have no complaints! I definitely recommend it and would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but watch price
customer_reviews.text: Love this pen. Works for my baby or small dogs. Very easy to set up and change shapes as necessary. Watch out for the pricing, though. I see the Amazon price for certain colors has gone up over $199. This is available at many other online sites for that price (also with free shipping) and you shouldn't pay more. Also, places like Bed Bath and Beyond often have coupon codes for 20% off.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A Schockweiler

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy of all of the baby stuff so far
customer_reviews.text: So WORTH the expense. My husband and I LOVE this. My son LOVES this. We use this everyday. We got this paired with the mat, SO GREAT. We do not regret having spent what we spent. The walls do not move. It’s great. My eight month old son pulls himself up to standing holding onto the walls and they don’t budge. They suction cup to the ground on our hardwood floor. He loves using the wall to walk around and the mat to crawl and play and it’s a SUPER BUY. I only wished we had gotten it sooner!! Worth it! Splurge! You’ll be glad you did
customer_reviews.author: P. Wong

customer_reviews.title: This is a great play yard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play yard, it is much more stable than the first one I purchased by Northern states (that one physically bent and wobbled when my 8 month old leaned against it). It fits the large baby care mat (not the medium). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Surfgal

customer_reviews.title: Best mat and playpen ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large "morrocan blue " mat with the fun zone play pen. First, the mat is gray-nothing blue about it. Gray is what I wanted and all the pictures showed it and it looked gray so I took a chance. It is perfectly gray! Its gorgeous and really big. The playpen fits it perfectly. I am so, so happy with this!!! My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: gate comes open with pressure
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this about 3 months or so. It was working fine but now that my baby can stand he applies pressure to the door and it flies open. No return/exchange or part replacement is available now through amazon because I bought this as soon as we came home from the hospital. :( very disappointed as this was an expensive item
customer_reviews.author: Kay K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful, although might be overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like it a lot. It's cute, and was very easy to assemble. But reviews are right, it might be overpriced as it's not super sturdy. My baby knocked it down only twice so far. On the bright side, she wasn't hurt because it's plastic. It's versatile, we used it as a fence for her corner while she was a crawler, as it's intended I guess, but soon we baby-proofed the living room with it, covering the fireplace with one side, and covering the entrance with another. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just got the play pen in today! My baby loves it. Great quality. The company has great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rickert

customer_reviews.title: missing 6 of Grey the stabalizers
customer_reviews.text: The ordered is missing six of the stabalizer pieces that are needed to hold the play yard in place, I received the corner ones but not the other six that are needed.
customer_reviews.author: s s

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen, but suction cups don't really work.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this playpen, except the suction cups at the bottom don't really work. I tried on hardwood floor and playmat, and neither work. The playpen itself is heavy enough so it doesn't move around, but my 8-month old baby was manage to push it out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Po W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Northstates one and it was ridiculous. My son was trying to climb it and kept getting fingers caught in the little squares. This play yard is exceptional. It's sturdy yet soft enough that if my son trips and hits himself on the sides it doesn't hurt. It gives a little upon impact. it's got plenty of room for an 17 month old so if your child is younger they will really enjoy this. I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ahsn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, You Won’t Regret It!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I spent way too much time comparing play pens on here. I ended up in a play pen worm hole. Do yourself a favor, stop looking and comparing; just get this one. Yes, it costs more, but it’s worth it. I spent about 3 minutes putting it together. It is ridiculously easy to set up. It seems sturdy and is way bigger than I expected. My 2yo and 5yo also love playing in it and they have yet to knock it down. I purchased the dinosaur mat on Amazon as well for super cheap and it fits perfectly. The piece that goes in between the sections ensures that baby arms won’t get caught.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wills

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and sticky
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and is was disgusting! Every panel was dirty and needed to be scrubbed.
customer_reviews.author: Drewfuss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playpen
customer_reviews.text: Fits well with the baby care mat to cushion early crawler/walker falls. Wipes down easily. 18 month old is just starting to climb the sides, but prior to this was perfect with plenty of room for toys and playtime. Downside for some may be that it is definitely on the bigger end, but that was exactly what I was looking for. Overall, very happy for this purchase! Will be saving for future kiddos, it is still in great shape over a year after buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 months old baby boy learned to stand holding on to this playpen! My LO holds on to this playpen and walks around it. I didn't have baby care mat, but I used Creamhaus mat, and the playpen is a bit bigger than my mat. Only thing I wish it worked better is if the suction works better. My baby can push the wall of the playpen and it sort of slides on my wooden floor.
customer_reviews.author: cuxy

customer_reviews.title: Good and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice playpen for our girl and is flexible with how you want to shape the pen. The only thing you have to watch for is the lip under the swinging gate as it creates a trip hazard especially if you're carrying your child in or out of the pen.
customer_reviews.author: The Douglass Family

customer_reviews.title: Door doesn’t shut—doesn’t stay straight—not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Door doesn’t shut all the way—also the pieces used to “secure” it don’t stay stuck, even with the double sided tape provided, so it moves lots. Would’ve sent it back but too much of a hassle. Will have to try and fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Fickle Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth for a while on whether to order this play pen or not, mainly because the cost is is significantly higher than other recommended play pens. Now that I’ve received it and set it up, I’m happy I paid the extra amount. It doesn’t have a toxic plastic smell. It’s stable enough for my 11 month old to stand up against it, and large enough for him to crawl around in. The only thing about this item in my experience was that shipping took longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Did not regret my decision
customer_reviews.text: It came packages nicely and was really easy to install. I loved the fact that the bottom has suction cups because our home only has hardwood floors. The pieces are light and big I didn’t even end up using all the pieces. It was very spacy and moving it around or reorganizing the walls wasn’t as hard as I thought. The only thing is that it has to be either straight or cornered, I mean you can place the pieces to make a rounder corner but it won’t be stable because it won’t have a middle piece to it. But other than that i really like this play pen. It’s staticky so hair sticks on to it but it’s cool
customer_reviews.author: voualaa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Playpen
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my crawling 6 month old baby. I'm glad I bought it! The quality is awesome! It's sturdy and it sticks on my tile floor.I bought the large mat as well and fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tinny

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one if the best baby product investments we've made so far
customer_reviews.text: This playpen and baby care mat that goes with it (buy separately) has been a game changer for us. Now we have a safe space & surface for our baby to practice crawling and play without us worrying that he'll hurt himself. Definitely one if the best baby product investments we've made so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We paired this with the baby care mat and it is perfect! We LOVE it! Spacious, sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ldianea

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life changer! I now feel safe to leave the room to use the bathroom or grab something. We have been using this since our son wasn’t about 9 months and he is very active. He hasn’t been able to escape yet! We bought a mat to use under it and it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this baby play pen
customer_reviews.text: After looking around, I opted to spend a little more with reviews of this product being a little more stable. Great product, easy to assemble, just make sure you have room for it!! Its nice and big. Don't forget the play mat that fits the space perfectly, I bought the Farm animal and reversible ABC mat to go with it. I am using this for my 9 month and my 4 yr old to play!! We also have concrete floors, so padding was a must.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble , clean, and definitely kept my baby In a safe space but the suction on the bottom isn’t great. It didn’t secure to my wood or tile so I had to put it between the sofa & wall so it won’t tip over if my daughter pushed or climbed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this as it is so dangerous to the baby. My baby loves to put his hands into the circle on the play pen, and he couldnt pull it back almost!! so dangerous as his hand got stuck inside and cried terribly! this product should recall!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki yan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but high quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love this playpen. My assembled SkyBlue looks beautiful and sturdy. The inner area is about the queen size mattress. Baby Care also has play mats that fit well inside this playpen. I love the mat even more since it is really well made and looks awesome. Highly recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: VPN

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for me. I care for my grandson full-time in the basement of a three-story home. I bought this and it fits nicely in the conversation area of their living room, since the main floor was difficult to baby-proof. We can get in there with the baby and guests even think it’s great. He’s only a little boy for such a little time.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Space for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen. It's extremely large and sturdy and gives my baby plenty of room to enjoy his toys. I like that the color goes with my decor and isn't the typical bright red, yellow, blue mix. I lay in here with the baby as he rolls his way around to his toys! I bought the matching babycare playmat and it fits perfectly. My 2 and 4 year old niece and nephew have outgrown the playpen phase but when they saw this at my house they loved it and played for hours in it. The manufacturer also provided excellent customer service which is hard to find these days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who has started to crawl and love how much space it gives her to still explore, have toys and not feel confined. My son to put together and it was quick and easy. Looking forward to adding other elements to it once she gets bigger. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Venuti

customer_reviews.title: Baby Jail
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jail for my little monster, perfectly fits around her playmat. Door has a secure latch so no chance of escapes. I have mine rough tile so suction cups don’t work for me, but very little movement otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: With how expensive these are, I did alot of research to get the best one for the money. This one won by a landslide. Best investment for when you need time to clean your house and you want your baby to be able to play. It is easy to assemble and tear down. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Ria Grana

customer_reviews.title: Pattern does not match the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. However, they no longer make the bunny pattern as shown in the picture. Now, it just has a babycare logo. Not as cute.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, it's on the pricey side but we ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, it's on the pricey side but we were so happy with it the in-laws purchased one for their house as well. We are even thinking about buying another one to add to this one for an even bigger play area. Don't get me wrong this is a large play area, we are just thinking about adding one for a slide/swing area.
customer_reviews.author: Pedroia

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits the mat I purchased. Great corral for the grand baby
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I love this play area for my baby boy
customer_reviews.text: I love this play area for my baby boy.. He was so happy too, He’s crawling and attempting to walk so it was a huge relief to have this playard so I don’t have to worry about hitting head on the floor,walls or corner... It’s very easy to put together, my husband took only few min to do it and totally worth it the purschase... Fast shipping too, They delivered here 3 days before the original date!!! I’m so very happy!!! Thank you guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen galic

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby care playpen for my play mat and I am so happy with it! It is on the more expensive side but its definitely worth it! Took maybe 5 minutes to put together has suction cups at the bottom and the locking mechanism at the top to keep the gate in place and this gate is very solid and well made.
customer_reviews.author: TBK.

customer_reviews.title: Safe,No smell,Easy clean!
customer_reviews.text: This size is good for the baby which can climbing on the ground. We will buy another one in the future to build a larger space for walking practice! Buy it!Buy it!Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: layla.chen

customer_reviews.title: An okay playpen
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is very easy to install. For the price of it I wish it was better made. The latch for the door gets stuck everytime. The suction cups at the bottom to hold the gate in place doesnt stick to my tiles floor. My 5 months old can roll around and kick which cause the suction cups to move out of place. Overall it's doing its purpose but I dont know how it can stand up to babies that are learning to walk.
customer_reviews.author: BOOne

customer_reviews.title: Item received was not the item pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the item in the picture. The item in the picture has rabbits on it, this one has stars which is not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: JALMED
customer_reviews.text: The logo on the inside is very sharp. The two letters “A” are like little daggers and can scrape baby’s face when they start to climb. Would not use after 8 months old.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. D

customer_reviews.title: Play pen for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good quality, & protects my crawling everywhere little 8month old boy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kirkam

customer_reviews.title: I am so sad. Other than that we would love this gate ...
customer_reviews.text: We have wooden floors and the suction cups won’t hold the gate in place :/ they don’t stick to our floor, I am so sad. Other than that we would love this gate but will have to return. I just don’t feel it’s safe for my baby and I don’t even want to think about compromising my baby safety.
customer_reviews.author: La Vida Loca

customer_reviews.title: Best playpen ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this baby playpen. Super sturdy and well made and fits the Baby Care mat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pushkin85

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 days to take it out the box. When I first opened it and saw all the pieces I was discouraged and left it in the box for 3 days. I finally got to it and it literally took me 5-10 minutes to assemble. I’m a die hard instruction reader and I honestly didn’t need them for this product! Very easy and self explanatory pieces! Once assembled my daughter loves being in there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Baby Care large play mat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Baby Care large play mat. Super easy to put together and it seems STURDY. Suction cups don’t stick perfectly to the floor but with the clips between each piece it doesn’t seem like it’s going anywhere. Seems to be worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ouisa

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with 220V
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with 220V outlets. Charges ok but as fast as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great if...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great if...the suction cups at the base would actually stick to the floor. Not very sturdy when your baby sits against it or uses it to pull up. For that price it should be better quality
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fit for the Baby Care mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fit for the Baby Care mat, but the suction cups don't always stick to the floor and i wish they had more variety of colors. (especially more neutral ones)
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Nice playpen
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy, easy to assemble, and big enough to fit two adults and a baby comfortably. If you wipe down the floors, it will suction onto the floors very well! However, we took the whole pen off the floors again for repositioning purposes and it didn’t stick as well again despite clean floors... 😔 still gets the job done. We got matching mats!
customer_reviews.author: hyk

customer_reviews.title: The best playpen money can buy and very safe for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue and white playpen for my 11 month old son back in September 2017 and it is the best playpen out there, I also bought a matching baby care mat and it is fantastic. We will use this for years as his play area and if we have more children. It is totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LewisAK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, tool about ten minutes with the baby on the mat. Perfect for our townhome. We purchased the mat from amazon as well and the size is perfect! I love how we don’t have to worry about him crawling into things now. He loves it as well.. great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This playard is great. Love that you can adjust the size. Good for baby when they start to crawl around. Sturdy enough for my 10.5 month to pull himself up and stand.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Large and safe playepen.
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen! Our infant has adjusted well to this. It's one of the larger ones I've come across and very easy to setup. We matched it the play mat. I highly recommend this to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Safe for baby if you need to leave the room.
customer_reviews.text: I chose the bright primary colored one because I found it stimulating for a baby/toddler. The mat I chose was also of primary colors and was soft over my den rug. It can be wiped clean if the baby drips his milk or juice. It brushes up easily after teething biscuits.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl t armand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, however suction cups don't work well
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups become loose and it's too easy for baby to push them away from mat. I sometimes worry that baby will have her finger / toes caught between gap of the fence and the mat.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a huge gate! We ended up taking out 2 panels Bc it was so large and our little one still had plenty of room. It’s extremely sturdy and I love how they have these covers (last photo) to prevent the gate from movement (we had that issue with another diff brand gate in the past) definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bndgrl83

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! Easy to assemble, I don’t need to read the instructions. Very sturdy, I don’t u derstand with other reviews that they don’t stand, I have a hard wood floors and the suction at the bottom works. Easy to clean. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: mom76

customer_reviews.title: Need 2 people assemble together
customer_reviews.text: This funzone gate needs 2 and more people to assemble together, it cannot adjust by 1 person. Each assembly has the logo of baby care which easy to stick the food or crayon and easy to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: takcheung

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and seems very solid
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and seems very solid. Fits the large Baby Care playmat perfectly as noted. It's a little pricey, but it is high quality. It's great for piece of mind knowing that when we put our daughter down on her playmat she's not going to scoot across the room if we turn our heads for a second. She seems to like it as well, and we can see her using it as a play house as she outgrows it's original purpose. Wasn't super pumped to pay $30 extra dollars to get the sky blue one over the multi colored, assuming the less offensive colored one is more popular so they can charge more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this forever to contain our early crawler and walker and keep her safe from the dangers of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Collins Green

customer_reviews.title: It’s not made of stone.  It will move around if you push it!
customer_reviews.text: New kid’s corral is great. The multicolored one is so vibrant. Sturdy and super easy to put together. Spend the money to buy the mat for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this playpen for my 8 month old daughter who is very active, now that she is able to crawl. Assembly was easy and I like the fact that you can modify these to smaller dimension. My baby now loves to walk sideways holding on the top. It is pleasing to the eyes and I’m very happy that I was able to create a safe environment for her.
customer_reviews.author: ahpamaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome large baby gates area. However, it doesn’t suction to our wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby gate! It has been a great spot for baby to crawl free and even big enough for me and my husband. I had to give 4 stars for sturdiness because my son Is starting to pull up now and I’m not sure how well it’ll work out once he’s walking and trying to climb out. Also, he can push the sides with 2 gate pieces and it moves. It did come with suction cups, but they don’t suction to our wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: While the PRICE is higher than any other brand.. this brand is the best when it comes to play pens. I have been researching extensively and this product is the KING of play pens. Having a soft play business this is the staple piece of your business and this PRODUCT IS DEFINITELY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaka

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect for my little crawler who is learning how to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for my little crawler who is learning how to walk. It was very easy to set up. Our baby loves cruising along he sides and playing in her play pen. It’s big enough for me to get in with her. I have it in my kitchen so I can cook while the baby plays and I can keep an eye on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the Baby Care Play Mat. My grandaughter is starting to crawl so getting the mat and playpen is the only way for her to crawl safely since the whole house is tiled. The mat an pen are both well made and excellent quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: This barrier installed with associated mattress is a perfect setting for toddler: no sharp edge and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Yen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set up and can be taken apart piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up and can be taken apart piece by piece to create a smaller play yard. Each panel says "for baby care baby play mat" which I find to be mildly annoying and unnecessary. Other than that, it would be close to perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this play mat yard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match with the mat I already had. It was a perfect fit, love the coordinating colors with mat. Easy to set up, sturdy, and big enough for my twins to be in together.
customer_reviews.author: CaryW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 10 stars! It took 5 minutes to assemble. Super durable. It’s a little more pricey than some other brands but WELL worth the money. Babies/children will definitely be safe in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great playpen for our daughter who’s starting to move around. Safe, sturdy, and doesn’t look bad in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is really big so there’s plenty of room for my son to move around. Only negative is the suction cups dont suction well to the floor
customer_reviews.author: Teabella415

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind and wonderful time
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves this playpen! My 9 year old sits in it with our baby and plays with him and it's adorable. He is just learning to pull himself up on it too. It keeps him safe since we have a large house and a professional crawler.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is for our granddaughter who will visit once or twice a year--since she lives far away. Therefore, it was important that it be safe, sturdy, easy to assemble and simple to clean. Thisis perfect and stores easily, too. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: noel belinski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Looks Good, and A Favorite Place to Play
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I got it to have a save place to put my 1 year old before my next child is born. It turns out that even my older kids like to play in it lol
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This gate is wonderful! We put a pkaymat inside to make a play yard. It was easy to assemble. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great product - we bought this as an extension to the same package we bought about a year ago. Easy to put together and flexible enough to meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Livanis

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been better than we expected. Very sturdy and easy to put together. We love the suction cups at the bottom to help it stay in place on hard floors. A great investment. Love the gate... Has 2 secure locks and easy to open and close. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I don’t know what I would’ve done without it! Good size and he can hold it and try to climb and stays put!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! So far it looks sturdy and easy to install. Not sure how long the suction will stick to our hardwood floor, but I’m happy with my purchase. Will be getting another one for my parents’ place. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: nku1983

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. Baby girl is very active and it’s nice being able to lay/sit there with her and watch her play... if you’re considering, just buy it! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: V. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Good ... but different pic
customer_reviews.text: Thought the playpen has bunny on it.. no... Just upset
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Way bigger than I expected which is good! Big enough for my twins to play and crawl around. I love how they can easily pull up on it. Only dislike I have is that the suction cups don’t stick to the floor so the panels do move sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin O’Brien

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves HER space. Locks herself in it when she needs a break. Great way to create a yes space where our daughter do what she wants to and be safe doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, the gray is neutral and seems like it will be a great product! Will update after we get to use it!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, the white/grey is very tasteful, can be assembled into tricky shapes as needed. Only con is that the bottom suction cups don't stick that well to wood. Had a previously purchased mat so can't speak to theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Minc

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this play mat pen! It’s very sturdy even when baby stands up and leans on it, it doesn’t move. Easy to assemble and move around if needed. Colors are very nice. Height is perfect for my 8 month
customer_reviews.author: AdyH

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, huge, a great buy. Roomy enough that my child doesn't feel confined and moves around freely.
customer_reviews.author: piccadilly

product_meta.title: Baby Care Funzone Play Pen (Vivid)
feature_bullets: Genuine play pen for Baby Care Play Mats
No tools needed to assemble or disassemble
Phthalate Free, BPA Free, Lead Free, Latex Free, Formaldehyde Free, EVA Free
Waterproof, Hygienic and tested to European Toy Standards EN71
One Play Pen encloses 31.6 square feet of space
